**NOVEMBER 4, 2025**

[Notice Of Deadline To File an Application](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Notice-of-Filing.pdf)

[NEW LAW: Changes to Early Voting by Personal Appearance – House Bill 1217](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/laws/advisory2023-10.shtml)

[Application for Place on General Election Ballot](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Application-for-Place-on-General-Election-Ballot.pdf)

November 5 2024 Election Calendar

[Order of General and Special Election for City of Overton](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Ord-No.-2024.05.16C-Order-of-General-Election.pdf)

**City of Overton contracts with Rusk and Smith Counties for elections.**

Rusk County:
<https://www.ruskcountytx.gov/page/rusk.Elections>

Smith County:
<https://www.smith-county.com/government/departments/elections/current-election-information>

State of Texas:
<https://www.sos.texas.gov/elections/index.shtml>

**For the November 2025 election, the following positions are open for applicants: Place 2, Place 4, and the Mayor. Last Day to File for Place on General Election Ballot is August 18, 2025**
There are three ways that you may receive a Candidate Application Packet for the November Election at the present time.
1.You may open and print the Candidate Application Packet shown above
.
2. The packet may be emailed to you. Please request one from TBEASLEY@CITYOFOVERTON.COM.
3. A hard copy may be made available at City Hall for you. Due to the cost of office supplies, please call ahead to ask that one be made for you.

[Election Identification Certificate (EIC) Now Required for All Texas Voters](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Election-Identification-Certificate-Now-Required-for-All-Texas-Voters_201306251446576637.pdf)
[Application for Texas Election Certificate (DL-14C)](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/DL-14C1-Application-for-Texas-Election-Certificate_201306251425535225.pdf)
